name: Uniform Retry Playbook - Phase 5/6 Validation
description: Playbook with uniform max_retries=2 for all APIs. Matches playbook_simulated hardcoded behavior for validation.

procedures.description: Inventory timeout: retry up to 2 times with 1s backoff
Payment timeout: retry up to 2 times with 1s backoff
Shipment timeout: retry up to 2 times with 1s backoff
ERP timeout: retry up to 2 times with 1s backoff
Inventory 503: retry up to 2 times with 2s backoff
Payment 503: retry up to 2 times with 2s backoff
Shipment 503: retry up to 2 times with 2s backoff
ERP 503: retry up to 2 times with 2s backoff

metadata.author: Phase 5/6 Validation Team
metadata.purpose: Uniform max_retries=2 to match playbook_simulated behavior
metadata.notes: Use this playbook to validate OrderAgentLLM equals playbook_simulated
